snippet: Elizabeth Warren's campaign manager sent out a request for donations prompted by nothing more than a similar request from Scott Brown, her opponent. The Warren e-mail reprints the Brown e-mail in its entirety.
abstract: Elizabeth Warren's campaign manager sent out a request for donations prompted by nothing more than a similar request from Scott Brown, her opponent. The Warren e-mail reprints the Brown e-mail in its entirety.

headline.main: An Unusual Fund-Raising Pitch in Massachusetts
